column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column167: Herald of Frost: Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents.
column345: Life-Prolonging Methods: When a character under the effects of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.
column346: A Glimpse Into Arcanum: When Qiqi hits opponents with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.
column347: Ascetics of Frost: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.
column348: Frozen to the Bone: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.
column349: Ascendant Praise: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column350: Divine Suppression: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.
column351: Crimson Lotus Bloom: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column352: Rite of Resurrection: Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP. This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.
